snippet.title: Professor Lupo and his Horrible Pets - Available on Switch! Alien indie puzzle adventure
snippet.description:
The wait is over! Professor Lupo and his Horrible Pets is now available on Steam and Nintendo Switch.
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/74...
Nintendo eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail...

Follow us on social media!
https://twitter.com/beautifungames
https://instagram.com/beautifungames
https://facebook.com/beautifungames
